content: I totally agree with you. the guardians of the galaxy movies are known for their iconic soundtracks, featuring classic hits from the 60s, 70s, and beyond. the music is a crucial part of the films, setting the tone and adding to the overall vibe and energy. it's like the soundtrack is its own character, contributing to the sense of adventure and fun that defines the franchise. the use of music also creates a unique atmosphere that sets the guardians of the galaxy apart from other comic book movies. overall, the music is an integral part of the franchise's success and a big reason why fans love it so much.
